DOC.brief_title: Study Etoposide Treating Patients With Recurrent Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Current recommend dosage Etoposide treat breast cancer 50 mg/m2 orally day 21 day , repeat every 28 day . With retrospective data review , study intend adjust Etoposide dose 60 mg/m2 daily 10 day , repeat every 21 day cycle , investigate effectiveness safety Etoposide monotherapy treatment recurrent metastatic breast cancer Chinese female patient .
DOC.criteria: Age : 1880 year old . ECOG status : 02 . Histologic cytologic diagnosis locally advance metastatic breast cancer . No three prior chemotherapy , adjuvant chemotherapy exclude . Received prior anthracycline , taxane therapy . At least 4 week previous chemotherapy . Measurable disease > =2 cm ( > =1 cm spiral CT scan ) . Life expectancy ≥ 3 month . Adequate organ function : Hemoglobin ≥10.0 g/dl , Absolute neutrophil count ≥1.5×10^9/L , Platelet count ≥100×10^9/L , Creatinine clearance ≥60ml/min , Bilirubin ≤1.5 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) ; AKP , AST ALT ≤2.5x ULN ( ≤5x ULN due liver metastasis ) . Signed informed consent . Menopausal woman receive surgical sterilization , woman child potential must pregnant nursing negative pregnancy test willing practice acceptable method birth control study 3 month study . Pregnancy lactation . Untreated uncontrolled CNS metastasis , refractory psychiatric illness . Prior treatment Etoposide . Other primary malignancy within past 5 year except carcinoma situ cervix nonmelanoma skin cancer . Clinically significant heart disease ( e.g.congestive heart failure , symptomatic coronary disease , uncontrolled cardiac arrhythmia , Myocardial infarction ) within past 12 month . Serious uncontrolled concurrent infection metabolism disorder . Concurrent treatment active peptic ulcer disease digestive disorder . Prior radiotherapy major surgery within 3 week screen .
